name: SaaS Project-Management
tagline: Redmine project management, online web based tracking, saas
body:
### Welcome to your Web Track Planning Product

We maintain a flexible web based project management tool "Redmine", and if you also need to keep an eye on your projects just sent us an email blogfactory1@gmail.com .
```
$ print "Which language do we speak?"
$ lang =gets.chomp   # HTML, CSS, Haml, jQuery, ...
$ print "Hey, we speak Ruby on Rails and #{lang}."
```

If you're interested to use a SaaS project management solution for you company just contact us.

### Here are Some Features 

* Multiple projects support
* Flexible role based access control
* Flexible issue tracking system
* Gantt chart and calendar
* News, documents & files management
* Feeds & email notifications
* Per project Wiki
* Per project forums
* Time tracking
* Custom fields for issues, time-entries, projects and users
* SCM integration (SVN, CVS, Git, Mercurial, Bazaar and Darcs)
* Issue creation via email
* Multiple LDAP authentication support
* User self-registration support
* Multilanguage support
* Multiple databases support

The documentation of Readmine can be find [here](http://www.redmine.org/projects/redmine/wiki/Guide).


### How it works?
It depends how many users will use the Software and where it will be installe. 
You decide where to install the Software. 

### Support and Contact
Having Questions? Just contact blogfactory1@gmail.com and weâ€™ll help you start your digital web based solution of Project-Management or whatever you like to do, begin it.
